name: Cook's Country Green Chile Cheeseburgers
ingredients: 3 Anaheim chiles, halved lengthwise and seeded
1 medium onion, sliced in three 1/2" thick rounds

instructions.en: Grill chiles and onion on outdoor grill over high heat until charred and tender, about 4 minutes per side. Cool in covered bowl for at least 5 minutes.
instructions.sk: Grilujte čili papričky a cibuľu na vonkajšom grile na vysokom ohni, kým nie sú opálené a mäkké, asi 4 minúty z každej strany. Nechajte vychladnúť v zakrytej miske aspoň 5 minút.
instructions.ja: 屋外グリルで高温でチリとタマネギを両面4分ずつ焦げ目がつき柔らかくなるまで焼きます。蓋をした器に入れ5分以上冷まします。

instructions.en: Peel and chop chiles and onions. Process with garlic in food processor until coarsely chopped. Puree 1/4 cup of mixture separately.
instructions.sk: Ošúpte a nasekajte čili papričky a cibuľu. Spracujte s cesnakom v kuchynskom robote na hrubo. Rozmixujte 1/4 šálky zmesi zvlášť.
instructions.ja: チリとタマネギの皮をむき刻みます。ニンニクと共にフードプロセッサーで粗く刻みます。1/4カップの混合物を別にピューレ状にします。

instructions.en: Mix pureed chiles with ground beef, salt, and pepper. Shape into four 3/4" thick patties with indentation in center. Refrigerate until ready to grill.
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte rozmixované čili s mletým hovädzím mäsom, soľou a korením. Vytvarujte štyri 2 cm hrubé fašírky s priehlbinou v strede. Chlaďte až do grilovania.
instructions.ja: ピューレ状のチリと挽肉、塩、コショウを混ぜます。4つの2cm厚のパティを作り、中央をくぼませます。グリルする直前まで冷蔵します。

instructions.en: Grill burgers 3-5 minutes per side. Top with chopped chile mixture and cheese. Grill until cheese melts and burgers are done.
instructions.sk: Grilujte fašírky 3-5 minút z každej strany. Navrch dajte nasekanú čili zmes a syr. Grilujte, kým sa syr neroztopí a fašírky nie sú hotové.
instructions.ja: バーガーを両面3-5分ずつ焼きます。刻んだチリミックスとチーズをのせます。チーズが溶けバーガーが焼けるまでグリルします。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Insert 2 toothpicks into the sides of each onion slice to keep them from falling apart on the grill. Remove toothpicks before chopping.
